properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Low in the grave He lay
Jesus my Saviour
Waiting the coming day
Jesus my Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Up from the grave He arose
With a mighty triumph o'er His foes
He arose a Victor
from the dark domain
And He lives forever
With His saints to reign
He arose, He arose
Halleluia! Christ arose

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Vainly they watched His bed
Jesus my Saviour
Vainly they seal the dead
Jesus my Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Death cannot keep his prey
Jesus my Saviour
He tore the bars away
Jesus my Lord
